Article.Title: Weather Boost Support For Possible IVs for Raid Bosses
Article.Text:
Raid Bosses can now be enhanced due to a "Weather Boost".
On each of the the Raid Boss Possible IVs pages, there is now a checkbox to allow you to swap between Weather Boosted or not.

Article.Title: New Tips Page
Article.Text:
There are a lot of secrets that Niantic doesn't document, but have been found and shared by other trainers.
I share ones I find most useful in the new Pokemon Tips page in the Pokemon Resources section.
Article.Note: Please let me know if you have any tips that would be nice to add.

Article.Title: New Evolutions Chart (Beta)
Article.Text:
One of the fun parts of Pokemon GO is Evolving. But what can turn into what?
The new Evolutions Chart can help you see what your Pokemon can become now, and up through Gen7.

News.Note: Of course this in Beta, so PLEASE let me know if you have any issues.
